# leanspace_leaf_space_integrations (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "leanspace_leaf_space_integrations" "integration_Connection" {
  name="Leafspace Connection Terraform"
  username= "leanspace01"
  password= "passworrd"
  domain_url= "sandbox.api.leaf.space"
}
```
